message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,000,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually agreeable price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and offer.  While I understand your position, the true value of this product is significantly higher than your proposal.  To move towards a deal, I'm willing to come down to $925,000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $750,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can we meet in the middle at $875,000?
